Reviews.Content: enjoyed time omni wouldn’t hesitate return feel 5star rating wouldn’t fair stayed 2 nights december weeklong california vacation research settled omni met expectations fell wee bit short couple pros • location bottom gaslamp • value premier double queen 1st night 159 snow promotion free valet complimentary margaritas macy’s coupon – technically own bottle sunscreen advertised didn’t 2nd night paid 219 internet rate • rate service – checkin staff concierge friendly helpful reservations requested fridge set plugged arrived promotion couldn’t rate online promotion didn’t apply year’s eve overlapped stay – called hotel’s front desk directly manager extremely helpful ensuring promotional rate applied night • views corner direct view petco stadium slightly nice coronado bridge paid extra premier nicer water view requested reservations view stadium cool december baseball offseason bonus • decentlysized fit 2 queen beds tv armoire 5 drawers yes flat screen quality lots channels office desk chair reading chair • bathroom spacious goodsized tubshower 2 robes lots shelf space towels including 2 bathmats nice touch – doesn’t hate standing soaking wet bathmat toiletries shampoo conditioner moisturizer vanity kit sewing shower gel hair dryer • amenities fulllength mirror mirror desk nice touch natural sunlight putting makeup bathroom doesn’t window coffee maker turndown service closet ample hangers safe 2 luggage racks loved • nice little touches – cookies concierge desk iced water lobby bottled water car valet service • omni guest membership – free wifi decent connection free beverages guest day including freshly squeezed orange juice – definitely perk • nice gym – view parking garage write home gym sunny spacious 4 elliptical machines 45 running machines recumbent bike weights nice little touches included free headsets running machines tv free iced water fruit lots towels • outdoor pool – december didn’t spend time summer hottub patios directly onto pool deck • parking valet included night selfpark night reasonable covered garage walk street paying 17 inflated price year’s eve 12 overnight parking hourly rate starting morning – checked 10am cons • noise requested quiet quieter floor night noisy neighbouring hotels bars – sounded outdoor club mc crowd cheering – didn’t night annoying somewhat unexpected indeed train tracks below occasionally hear odd train – floor wasn’t unbearable expecting train noise highlight light sleepers • overall couple little touches 1 lighting – nice sunny day corner night overhead lighting relying basically table lamps actually dark reading difficult 2 ceiling fan hooks bathroom weren’t lot options hanging towels robes etc stay absolutely level accommodation service feel omni offers value don’t feel warrants 5 stars noise challenges minor annoyances easily addressed looking service location relative value downtown san diego omni choice
